thread.title: Manchester United face crucial run as Liverpool chase sun | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Manchester United face crucial run as Liverpool chase sun | Daily Mail Online

author: Adam Shergold For Mailonline
title: Manchester United face crucial run as Liverpool chase sun | Daily Mail Online
text: Manchester United not in Premier League action again until March and Liverpool could have two weeks off as clubs start chasing the sun Man United face important fixtures in three competitions before end of month Jose Mourinho's team play in the Europa League, FA Cup and EFL Cup Liverpool, by contrast, have just one Premier League fixture left in February Jurgen Klopp's team will fly off to La Manga in Spain for warm-weather training West Ham, Stoke, Everton and Sunderland are also heading for training camps Published: 10:04 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 10:48 GMT, 13 February 2017 8 shares
